parameter.value: Welcome, young |PLAYERNAME|! If you are heavily wounded or poisoned, I can heal you for free.
Of course, just browse through my wonderful clothes.
I have no job. I just live for the gods of Tibia.
Earn some gold and upgrade your equipment.
If you need money, you have to slay monsters and take their gold. Look for swamptrolls in the swamps. But be careful. They use poisoned weapons.
They are the creators of Tibia and all life on it.
